mapper.select: SELECT og.id, og.sku_id, og.original_price, og.paid_price, og.order_id, og.status_id, s.name statusName, og.count, og.deleted, og.create_time, og.update_time FROM tb_order_goods og LEFT JOIN tb_order_status s ON og.status_id = s.id WHERE og.deleted = 0 and og.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT og.id, og.sku_id, og.original_price, og.paid_price, og.order_id, og.status_id, s.name statusName, og.count, og.deleted, og.create_time, og.update_time FROM tb_order_goods og LEFT JOIN tb_order_status s ON og.status_id = s.id WHERE og.deleted = 0 where og.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into greenorange.tb_order_goods(sku_id, original_price, paid_price, order_id, status_id, count, deleted) values (#{skuId}, #{originalPrice}, #{paidPrice}, #{orderId}, #{statusId}, #{count}, #{deleted})
mapper.update:
